name: Galactic Conquest
description: This is a Space-Invader Clone that was for a school project. It is very simple, and it is my first ever video game that I made myself. I used Stencyl to make the game. I did use Stencyle's starter template 'AlienApproach' for the layout, but all of the assets; such as audio, screens, and art work are mine. Over all, I am pretty proud of it, and I can say that I enjoyed making it. I did have some minor guidance and assistance on the coding from my professor and from a friend of mine.
